comment.author: 25100796@N08
comment._content: Photo probably dates from November 1910. The November 14th edition of the NY Times describes the National Horse Show Association in Madison Square Garden, and notes the presence of foreign officers including: Colonel P. A. Kenna, VC; Lieutenants Geoffrey Brooke and C. F. Walwyn of the Royal Horse Artillery; and Lieutenant Walter Brooke of the Yorkshire Light Artillery. See query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9903E...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Appreciate your help! We'll update the description with fuller names from the negative and reference to the horse show event.
